Structs/GradientPoint/Location.html.name: Location
Structs/GradientPoint/Location.html.abstract: Represents a valid coordinate for either the x or the y of a GradientPoint.

Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:FV8Skeleto.name: init(x:y:)
Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:FV8Skeleto.abstract: Initializes a GradientPoint given an x and a y. They both default to .default.

Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:vV8Skeleto.name: cgPoint
Structs/GradientPoint.html#/s:vV8Skeleto.abstract: A convenient way to convert a GradientPoint to a CGPoint.

Structs/GradientPoint.html.name: GradientPoint
Structs/GradientPoint.html.abstract: Represents a valid point for a CAGradientLayer’s startPoint or endPoint when beginning or ending a slide.

Structs/Transition.html.name: Transition
Structs/Transition.html.abstract: A generic structure to represent a transition.

Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:vP8Skel.name: gradientLayers
Protocols/GradientsOwner.html#/s:vP8Skel.abstract: The CAGradientLayers that will be sliding when slide(to dir: Direction) is called.

Protocols/GradientsOwner.html.name: GradientsOwner
Protocols/GradientsOwner.html.abstract: A protocol that allows grouping CAGradientLayers together. Useful to have built-in sliding behavior for all CAGradientLayers in gradientLayers.

Extensions/CAGradientLayer.html#/s:ZvE8S.name: kSlidingAnimationKey
Extensions/CAGradientLayer.html#/s:ZvE8S.abstract: The key used for the sliding animation.

Extensions/CABasicAnimation.html#/s:FE8S.name: applyGradientTransition(_:)
Extensions/CABasicAnimation.html#/s:FE8S.abstract: A convenient way to apply a GradientTransition to a CABasicAnimation.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:vC8Skeleton.name: gradientLayer
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:vC8Skeleton.abstract: A convenient way to access the GradientView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:FC8Skeleton.name: slide(to:group:)
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:FC8Skeleton.abstract: A convenient way to slide the GradientView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientView.html#/s:FC8Skeleton.name: stopSliding()
Classes/GradientView.html#/s:FC8Skeleton.abstract: A convenient way to stop sliding the GradientView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientContainerView.html#/s:FC.name: setUpGradientView()
Classes/GradientContainerView.html#/s:FC.abstract: Sets up the GradientView with constraints that that cause it to fill the UIView entirely.

Classes/GradientContainerView.html#/s:vC.name: gradientLayer
Classes/GradientContainerView.html#/s:vC.abstract: A convenient way to access the GradientContainerView’s corresponding CAGradientLayer.

Classes/GradientContainerView.html.name: GradientContainerView
Classes/GradientContainerView.html.abstract: A view that contains a GradientView. Useful for sliding a CAGradientLayer without affecting the bottom-most CALayer.
